      Copy 
      // lib.dom.d.ts
declare function fetch(
  input: RequestInfo,
  init?: RequestInit
): Promise<Response>;
      Copy 
      const checkedFetch: typeof fetch = async (input, init) => {
  const response = await fetch(input, init);
  if (!response.ok) {
    throw new Error("Request failed: " + response.status);
  }
  return response;
};
